title: OT89: Omen Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- The post includes multiple updates and announcements from the author.
- The author responds to criticism about one of his previous posts on airlines offering a lower-fare standing option.
- The author encourages interested individuals to check out job openings with the Future of Humanity Institute.

Key learnings:
- The Future of Humanity Institute is looking to fill two AI safety researcher positions.
- There are updated drafts available for David Friedman's book which was previously reviewed by the author in another post.
- The Washington DC SSC meetup group is having a Thanksgiving potluck.

Key questions:
- None mentioned.
